caption.title: Location of Ovitraps in Madeira Island.
caption.p: The distribution of ovitrap location across the island, as reported in the Entomological panel bulletins (PEnt_RAMW52/2019, in Portuguese) of the Institute of Health Administration, IP-RAM (IASAÚDE IP-RAM). The colored dots on the map, represents the cumulative number of eggs in each location for the week 10, 2018 to week 52, 2019. Blue = 0%, Dark green = 1%-10%, Light green = 11%–20%, Yellow = 21%–30%, Orange = 31%–40%, Red = 41%–100%. Cumulative number of eggs for all location = 37766. Adapted from Institute of Health Administration, IP-RAM [ 34].
Click here for additional data file.
